name: Eiffel Tower
description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron masterpiece and an iconic symbol of Paris. It offers breathtaking views of the city.
nearby_hotel: Hotel de la Bourdonnais - A luxury hotel located just a short walk from the Eiffel Tower.

name: Machu Picchu
description: Machu Picchu is an ancient Inca citadel situated high in the Andes Mountains. It's a UNESCO World Heritage site and a must-visit for history enthusiasts.
nearby_hotel: Belmond Sanctuary Lodge - The only hotel located right next to Machu Picchu, offering stunning views.

name: Great Wall of China
description: The Great Wall of China is an ancient fortification that stretches over 13,000 miles. It's a symbol of China's rich history and culture.
nearby_hotel: Brickyard Retreat at Mutianyu Great Wall - A boutique hotel located near the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: The Statue of Liberty is a symbol of freedom and democracy. Visitors can take a ferry to Liberty Island and explore the statue and its history.
nearby_hotel: Conrad New York Downtown - A luxury hotel with views of the Statue of Liberty, located in Lower Manhattan.

name: Taj Mahal
description: The Taj Mahal is a stunning white marble mausoleum in Agra, India. It's a UNESCO World Heritage site and a symbol of eternal love.
nearby_hotel: The Oberoi Amarvilas - A luxurious hotel with views of the Taj Mahal from every room.

name: Santorini
description: Santorini is a stunning Greek island known for its whitewashed buildings, crystal-clear waters, and breathtaking sunsets.
nearby_hotel: Grace Santorini - A boutique hotel perched on the cliffs of Santorini, offering panoramic views.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: The Sydney Opera House is an architectural marvel and a world-renowned performing arts venue located on Sydney Harbour.
nearby_hotel: Park Hyatt Sydney - A luxury hotel with stunning views of the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge.

name: Petra
description: Petra is an ancient city carved into rose-red cliffs in southern Jordan. It's known for its rock-cut architecture and historical significance.
nearby_hotel: MÃ¶venpick Resort Petra - A hotel located near the entrance to Petra, offering convenience for visitors.

name: The Colosseum
description: The Colosseum is an ancient Roman amphitheater located in the heart of Rome. It's a symbol of Roman engineering and entertainment.
nearby_hotel: Palazzo Manfredi - A boutique hotel with views of the Colosseum, located in the historic center of Rome.

name: Banff National Park
description: Banff National Park is a stunning natural playground in the Canadian Rockies. It's known for its pristine landscapes and outdoor activities.
nearby_hotel: Fairmont Banff Springs - A historic luxury hotel nestled in the heart of Banff National Park.
